# multisampleColorAttachmentTextureUsage

**Instance Property**

The texture usage characteristics that the view uses when creating multisample textures.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var multisampleColorAttachmentTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLTextureUsage/renderTarget].

## Configuring Multisampling

- **sampleCount**: The sample count used to generate the [doc://com.apple.metalkit/documentation/MetalKit/MTKView/multisampleColorTexture] object.
